casual: Oops! The internet gremlins are at it again. Mind trying that one more time?
Well, this is awkward. The network decided to take a coffee break.
Houston, we have a connection problem. But nothing we can't fix with a quick retry!
The tubes are clogged! (No, not those tubes. The internet tubes.)
Your request is stuck in traffic. Digital traffic, that is.
professional: We're experiencing connectivity issues at the moment. Please try again shortly.
The requested resource is currently unavailable due to network conditions.
A temporary network interruption has occurred. Your patience is appreciated.
Network timeout occurred while processing your request.
Unable to establish connection with the remote server.
humorous: The packets got lost on their way to the server. We suspect they stopped for snacks.
Error 404: Network not found. (It's hiding behind the couch.)
Your request went on an adventure and hasn't come back yet. Dragons might be involved.
The internet is currently held together by duct tape and prayers. Please stand by.
Connection refused faster than a bad Tinder date.

casual: Hmm, we couldn't verify that's really you. Mind checking your credentials?
Access denied! But in a friendly way. Let's try logging in again?
Your session seems to have wandered off. Time for a fresh login!
That password isn't ringing any bells. Want to give it another shot?
Looks like your login expired while you were away. Welcome back though!
professional: Authentication required. Please verify your credentials and try again.
Your session has expired. Please log in to continue.
Access to this resource requires valid authentication credentials.
Invalid credentials provided. Please check your username and password.
Authorization token is missing or invalid.
humorous: Nice try, but you're not on the list. The bouncer says no entry without proper ID!
Your password is like my motivation on Monday morning: nowhere to be found.
The authentication wizard has spoken: 'You shall not pass!' (without logging in first)
Access denied with extreme prejudice. Just kidding, please just log in again.
Your session expired faster than milk left out in the sun.

casual: Our database is taking a quick breather. Give it a moment?
The data elves are reorganizing the shelves. Back in a jiffy!
Database said 'brb'. Should be back any second now.
The filing cabinet is stuck. We're wiggling the drawer as we speak.
Data's playing hide and seek right now. We're counting to ten and trying again.
professional: A database error has occurred. Our team has been notified.
Unable to complete the operation due to a temporary database issue.
The data service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
Database connection pool exhausted. Retry recommended.
Query execution failed due to resource constraints.
humorous: The database went to find itself. It's on a spiritual journey and will return enlightened.
Error: Database is currently practicing social distancing from your query.
Our database is like a teenager's room: we know the data is in there somewhere...
The database has commitment issues. It can't commit your transaction right now.
404: Database not found. Have you checked behind the server rack?

casual: Something doesn't look quite right with that input. Mind double-checking?
Oops! That data format isn't quite what we expected.
Close, but not quite! Let's try that again with the correct format.
That input made our validator do a double-take. Can you review it?
Almost perfect! Just need to tweak the format a tiny bit.
professional: The submitted data does not meet validation requirements.
Invalid input detected. Please review the request format and try again.
Request validation failed. Please ensure all required fields are properly formatted.
One or more fields contain invalid data. Please correct and resubmit.
Input validation error: please check your data and try again.
humorous: Your input was creative, but our validator is a bit of a perfectionist.
The data you sent is like pineapple on pizza: controversial and not accepted here.
Nice try, but our validation rules are stricter than airport security!
That input format is so last season. We've updated our requirements!
Your data failed the vibe check. Try again with better vibes (and valid formatting).

casual: Whoa there, speedy! Let's slow down just a bit.
You're on fire today! But maybe take a quick breather?
Too much enthusiasm! Give us a moment to catch up.
Pump the brakes a little! We love your energy though.
Easy does it! Rome wasn't built in a day, and neither are API requests.
professional: Rate limit exceeded. Please reduce request frequency.
Too many requests. Please wait before retrying.
Request quota exceeded. Service will resume shortly.
API rate limit has been reached. Please try again later.
Maximum request threshold exceeded. Please wait 60 seconds.
humorous: Easy there, tiger! Even The Flash takes breaks between runs.
You're clicking faster than a caffeinated developer on deadline day!
Slow down! This isn't a speed-running competition... or is it?
Whoa, Neo! Even in the Matrix they had rate limits.
Your enthusiasm has been noted and promptly rate-limited. Try again in a moment!

casual: Something went sideways on our end. We're on it!
Well, that wasn't supposed to happen. Our bad!
The server hiccupped. Give us a sec to get it some water.
Yikes! Something broke on our side. Time to grab the duct tape!
Our server just had a moment. It's feeling better now, please retry.
professional: An internal server error has occurred. The issue has been logged.
We're experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.
A server error prevented the operation from completing successfully.
Internal server error. Our engineering team has been notified.
The server encountered an unexpected condition. Please retry your request.
humorous: The server just threw a tantrum. We're giving it a timeout.
Error 500: The server has existential questions and needs a moment.
Our server is having a bad day. Maybe it needs a firmware hug?
The hamsters powering our servers need a snack break. Back soon!
Server.exe has stopped working. Have you tried turning it off and on again?

casual: We haven't built that feature yet, but it's on our list!
Coming soon to a server near you! Just not... right now.
That's a great idea! We're still working on making it happen.
This feature is currently in the 'brilliant ideas' phase of development.
Patience, young padawan. This feature is still in training.
professional: This functionality is not yet implemented.
The requested feature is currently under development.
This operation is not available at this time.
Feature not yet available. Please check back in a future release.
This endpoint is planned for a future version.
humorous: That feature is still in the 'we'll get to it eventually' pile.
Our developers are still arguing about how to implement this. Check back later!
This feature is like my gym membership: planned but not yet implemented.
Error 501: Feature is currently having an identity crisis.
That button? Oh, it's decorative. Very decorative. (Coming soon, we promise!)
